ruleBookInfo.intro:
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result); '
' + J.select('.book-intro').html() + '🎐' + J.select('.detail .tags') .toArray() .map(el => '🏷️' + el.text()).join(' ') result.replace(/🎐/g,'\n'+'​'+'\n')
ruleBookInfo.name: .book-info h1 em@text
ruleBookInfo.tocUrl:
<js>
var bid = baseUrl.match(/info\/(\d+)/)[1];
java.put('bid', bid);
'https://druid.if.qidian.com/argus/api/v1/chapterlist/chapterlist?bookId=' + bid;
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var json=JSON.parse(result).Data;
var bid=json.BookId;
var base="https://m.qidian.com/book/"+bid+"/";
chapter=json.Chapters.slice(1);
vol=json.Volumes;
list=[];

 for(i in vol){
       list.push({title:"📖 "+vol[i].VolumeName+" 📖",
time:"",
link:"http://www.baidu.com?wd="+vol[i].VolumeCode})
       for(j in chapter){        
            if(chapter[j].Vc==vol[i].VolumeCode){
                 ch=chapter[j];
                 list.push({
                 title:String(ch.V?ch.N+" · ✐":ch.N).replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g,''),
                 link:base+ch.C,               
                 time:ch.W+"字  "+String(java.timeFormat(ch.T)).replace(/\//g,'-')})
                }
            }
        }
list
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
     Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.java.util 
);
with(javaImport){
    let IV_PARAMETER = String("1ae2c94b");
    let ALGORITHM = "DES"; 
    let CIPHER_ALGORITHM = "DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding";
    let CHARSET = "utf-8";
    let password=String("KK!%G3JdCHJxpAF3%Vg9pN");


function decode(data){
let dks = new DESKeySpec(String(password).getBytes());
let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES");
let secretKey = keyFactory.generateSecret(dks);
let cipher = Cipher.getInstance(CIPHER_ALGORITHM);
let iv = new IvParameterSpec(IV_PARAMETER.getBytes(CHARSET));
cipher.init(Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE, secretKey, iv);
return new String(cipher.doFinal(Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(data).getBytes(CHARSET))), CHARSET);

}
}
//DES解密结束


content=java.getString("$.content",false);

result=String(decode(content)+say);
}else{result=content+say}
</js>

bookSourceComment:
①可搜索文章名、作者名、主角配角名和其它关键字里包含该关键字的文章，搜索结果按作品收藏数排序，不局限于书名或作者
②发现的标签均为言情，且标签很多，可自行增删改，只要链接是晋江网页版的就行
③搜索和发现里显示的书籍封面为晋江默认封面，所以封面地址都删了，只留了详情页的正确封面
④详情页没有灌溉和霸王票排名，需要的可根据关耳小姐姐的源加上
⑤正文默认替换作话的感谢投食
⑥本书源基于2.23源仓库用户Ｏ。分享的书源“晋江文学”，根据酷安@关耳010225和@乃星的3.1更新的书源美化
    by viviyaaa

bookSourceComment:
用法如下：
①可从发现（较为详细），点进详情页正文，从正文跳转到浏览器，有三个下载渠道，将txt下载即可阅读。
②也可用搜索进行搜书，搜到后用法如上。
txt阅读时记得调整目录规则嗷，体验感奈斯！
感谢渊呀大大 帮忙嗷！

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('.intro').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: baseUrl,
};
book;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var og = (selector) =>
  J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content');

var book = {
  name: og('novel:book_name'),
  author: og('novel:author'),
  kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status'),
  latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name') + ' • ' + String(og('novel:update_time')).replace(/(\d+:\d+)/,''),
  cover: og('image').replace('https','http'),
  wordCount: J.select('.layui-bg-red').text(),
  intro: J.select('.intro p').eq(0).html(),
  url:og('novel:read_url').replace('m.','www.')
};

book;
</js>

var displayChars="的一是了我不人在他有这个上们来到时大地为子中你说生国年着就那和要她出也得里后自以会家可下而过天去能对小多然于心学么之都好看起发当没成只如事把还用第样道想作种开美总从无情己面最女但现前些所同日手又行意动";

var slect="i";

function convertChar(str) {
let index = sourceChars.indexOf(str)
if(index != -1) return displayChars[index]
}

var doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result).select('#txt');
doc.select(slect).toArray().forEach(ele=>{
let str = escape(ele.text());
ele.text(convertChar(str))
})
doc.select("h1").remove();
doc.html()+'❌';
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('.intro').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: baseUrl,
};
book;
</js>
